definition: to see/to look at/to read/to watch/to visit/to call on/to consider/to regard as/to look after/to treat (an illness)/to depend on/to feel (that)/(after verb) to give it a try/Watch out! (for a danger)
to look after/to take care of/to watch/to guard

sentences.english: Our seats are in the grandstand.
sentences.chinese: 咱们的座位在正面看台。

sentences.english: A furious player kicked his racket into the grandstand.
sentences.chinese: 一位愤怒的球员将他的球拍踢向了看台。
我们还是买露天看台座位好了。

sentences.english: The second floor includes a grandstand area and lounge area.
sentences.chinese: 二层则设有看台区，并配备专门的休息室。

sentences.english: Then why are we sitting in the grandstand?
sentences.chinese: 那我们为什么要坐在正面看台呢？

sentences.english: The stands at the sports ground rake steeply.
sentences.chinese: 运动场的看台坡度很大。

sentences.english: An original detail on the East stand.
sentences.chinese: 从一户阳台上看东看台和花园。

sentences.english: The famous clock at Highbury actually started its life overlooking the North Bank.
sentences.chinese: 海布里著名的大钟最早是安装在北看台。

sentences.english: The East Stand, for all its magnificence also has a controversial past.
sentences.chinese: 富丽堂皇的东看台也有着备受争议的历史。

sentences.english: Wrighty ran to the new North Bank Stand and embraced the fans in the front row.
sentences.chinese: 赖特跑到了新的北看台，和前面的球迷拥抱。

sentences.english: Developed the grandstands model of National Stadium for Beijing 2008 Olympic Games.
sentences.chinese: 图为用空间建模软件建的奥运会国家体育场看台模型。

sentences.english: The detailed plans are for the same set of bleachers that sit in the prison yard.
sentences.chinese: 其外形轮廓与监狱院子里的一组看台是相同的。

sentences.english: Westminster Abby, neo-Gothic design stands in front of Thames River.
sentences.chinese: 威斯敏斯特艾比，新哥特式设计看台前面的泰晤士河。

sentences.english: Gazidis replied that attention was being given to the upper tier.
sentences.chinese: 加奇迪斯答复说已经留意到了上面的看台。

sentences.english: Next, all eyes turned towards the platform reserved for the Flemish envoys.
sentences.chinese: 大家的视线遂转向留给弗朗德勒使臣的看台。

sentences.english: See below for some 'before and after' pictures of Highbury's East and West Stands.
sentences.chinese: 题头图是看台拆除前后的情况。

definition: hissing sound/to hiss (as a sign of displeasure)
to cheer for/to encourage/to boost the morale of
elevated stage on which martial competitions or duels were held/arena/ring
